dialog.text: Afternoon %you.first_name%, sorry I missed your message this morning was busy on my project.  How was the weekend?

joins.text: Sound like you had a great time.

dialog.text: Mine was too.  Managed to get Sunday off and moved my life - a grand total of 3 boxes and 2 suitcases - into my Mum's house.  Its not a big room, but its quiet.  Mum and me had a great chat and I realised how much I had missed being at home - you know what I mean?  Mum's been so great.  Anyway - new week, new goals - right!  Did you get any work done over the weekend?
Lets make a pact to do a LeetCode problem a day.  Oh is that the time - got to shoot!
